title: Ancelotti fumes at Real Madrid´s quick turnaround
description: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti said his team will refuse to play matches if they are not given at least 72 hours of rest beforehand. Kylian Mbappe scored twice as Madrid beat Villarreal 2-1 on Saturday in LaLiga. However, the contest came less than three full days after Madrid’s Champions League clash with Atletico Madrid, […] The post Ancelotti fumes at Real Madrid´s quick turnaround appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Kompany credits Union Berlin for holding Bundesliga leaders Bayern
description: Vincent Kompany refused to be overly critical of his Bayern Munich team after their 1-1 draw with Union Berlin on Saturday. Leroy Sane’s 75th-minute strike was swiftly cancelled out by a Benedict Hollerbach equaliser at Stadion An der Alten Forsterei. Union had only seven shots to Bayern’s 18, but the visitors only managed to get […] The post Kompany credits Union Berlin for holding Bundesliga leaders Bayern appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
